items.title: DOGE Is Doing the Opposite of Government Auditing
items.description: On this special episode of Uncanny Valley, we talk about what federal auditors actually do, and what they think of DOGE.

items.title: A Livestreamed Tragedy on X Sparks a Memecoin Frenzy
items.description: When a young man from California broadcast his death on X, profit-hungry traders piled into a cryptocurrency created in his image.

items.title: The Best Hearing Aids of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
items.description: These WIRED-tested and audiologist-approved devices will help you hear sounds more clearly. Never miss out on a dinner conversation again.

items.title: Speediance Gym Monster 2 Review: All-in-One Workout Machine
